channel.title: How to fix Kill Java.bat (Taskkill command not recognized)
channel.description:
Thought I would help out anybody else who had this issue with the taskkill command not being recognized.
Open cmd (Open it with Admin privileges.)
Type in this: [code=text]set Path=C:\Windows\System32%Path%[/code]
The taskkill command should now work. Next open the kill Java.bat and put this into it: [code=text]taskkill /F /IM javaw.exe taskkill /F /IM java.exe exit[/code]
Make sure to run kill Java in admin.
Pretty straight forward.
